name: Terix Survivors
description:
Terix Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.
Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide.
All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.
Gather gold in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor.

The supernatural indie phenomenon that lets you be the bullet hell!
